ew-extension.name: PHPExcel
ew-extension.author: e.World
ew-extension.description:
Use PHPExcel to export HTML to Excel Developer Website: http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/ PHPExcel is available under the terms of the LGPL License.
This extension supports exporting to 'Excel5' or 'Excel2007' format and supports exporting images.
This extension does NOT support exporting reports.
This extension does NOT support styling cells.
Requirements: (See http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Requirements for detail) - PHP version 5.2.0 or higher - PHP extension php_zip enabled (required for 'Excel2007' only) - PHP extension php_xml enabled - PHP extension php_gd2 enabled (if not compiled in)
Excel5 (BIFF) limitations: (See PHPExcel documentation for detail) Please note that BIFF file format has some limits regarding to styling cells and handling large spreadsheets via PHP.
Note: This extension is NOT part of PHPMaker, NO technical support will be provided.
